de.hshannover.f4.trust.ifmapj.metadata

Interface Metadata


  • public interface Metadata
    Interface for common IF-MAP metadata attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCardinality()
      Return the cardinality of this metadata.
      String getLocalname()
      Return the local type name of this metadata without the namespace prefix.
      String getPublisherId()
      Return the publisher id of this metadata.
      String getPublishTimestamp()
      Return the publish timestamp of this metadata.
      double getPublishTimestampFraction()
      Return the publish timestamp fraction of this metadata.
      String getTypename()
      Return the type name of this metadata, including the namespace prefix.
      String getValueForXpathExpression(String xPathExpression)
      Evaluate the given XPath expression on this metadata document and return the result string.
      String getValueForXpathExpressionOrElse(String xPathExpression, String defaultValue)
      Evaluate the given XPath expression on this metadata document and return the result string.
      boolean isMultiValue()
      Return true if this metadata has 'multiValue' cardinality.
      boolean isSingleValue()
      Return true if this metadata has 'singleValue' cardinality.
      void setNamespaceContext(NamespaceContext context)
      Set the given NamespaceContext as the namespace context for XPath queries.
      String toFormattedString()
      Returns a formatted XML string representation of this metadata document.

    • Method Detail

      • getPublisherId

        String getPublisherId()
        Return the publisher id of this metadata. If this metadata object has no publisher id the empty string is returned. If the extraction of the publisher id fails null is returned.
        Returns:
        the publisher id, null or the empty string

      • getPublishTimestamp

        String getPublishTimestamp()
        Return the publish timestamp of this metadata. If this metadata object has no publish timestamp the empty string is returned. If the extraction of the publish timestamp fails null is returned.
        Returns:
        the publish timestamp, null or the empty string

      • getPublishTimestampFraction

        double getPublishTimestampFraction()
        Return the publish timestamp fraction of this metadata. If this metadata object has no publish timestamp fraction or the extraction fails, 0.0 is returned.
        Returns:
        the publish timestamp fraction

      • getTypename

        String getTypename()
        Return the type name of this metadata, including the namespace prefix. If the extraction of the type name fails null is returned.
        Returns:
        the type name or null

      • getLocalname

        String getLocalname()
        Return the local type name of this metadata without the namespace prefix. If the extraction of the type name fails null is returned.
        Returns:
        the local type name or null

      • getCardinality

        String getCardinality()
        Return the cardinality of this metadata. If this metadata object has no cardinality the empty string is returned. If the extraction of the cardinality fails null is returned.
        Returns:
        the cardinality, null or the empty string

      • isSingleValue

        boolean isSingleValue()
        Return true if this metadata has 'singleValue' cardinality.
        Returns:
        true if cardinality equals 'singleValue'

      • isMultiValue

        boolean isMultiValue()
        Return true if this metadata has 'multiValue' cardinality.
        Returns:
        true if cardinality equals 'multiValue'

      • getValueForXpathExpression

        String getValueForXpathExpression(String xPathExpression)
        Evaluate the given XPath expression on this metadata document and return the result string. If this metadata object does not match the given expression the empty string is returned. If the evaluation of the expression fails null is returned.
        Parameters:
        xPathExpression - the XPath expression
        Returns:
        the result string, null or the empty string

      • getValueForXpathExpressionOrElse

        String getValueForXpathExpressionOrElse(String xPathExpression,
                                        String defaultValue)
        Evaluate the given XPath expression on this metadata document and return the result string. If the evaluation fails the given default value will be returned.
        Parameters:
        xPathExpression - the XPath expression
        defaultValue - the default value
        Returns:
        the result string or the default value

      • toFormattedString

        String toFormattedString()
        Returns a formatted XML string representation of this metadata document.
        Returns:
        formatted XML string

      • setNamespaceContext

        void setNamespaceContext(NamespaceContext context)
        Set the given NamespaceContext as the namespace context for XPath queries.
        Parameters:
        context - the new namespace context
